originalText.text: I discovered RA MA through a community event and I‚Äôve been hooked ever since. I had very little knowledge about kundalini yoga when I started and they are wonderful at articulating the lessons and techniques in every class. The space is beautiful, welcoming, clean, and peaceful. The instructors are all incredible people and I love everyone I meet there, it truly feels like a family. It‚Äôs rare to find a space in this busy city that can calm your mind, body, and soul and I‚Äôm just so grateful to have discovered this amazing sanctuary.

originalText.text: I have been attending classes, trainings, and events at RA MA for over three years and it is the absolute best! The energy, the sound/ music, the community, everything keeps me coming back for more. I‚Äôve tried out other studios/ teachers and nowhere and no one is better that what‚Äôs going on at RA MA. We‚Äôve got a powerful lineage so if your ready to ride the cosmic currents to your exalted destiny join us!

originalText.text: Came here yesterday for workshop and felt soooo good after! Amazing experience, so much positive energy and cherry on top was gong meditation! 3 hours total relaxation and positive vibes! They also have quite and  nice backyard üôèThanks a lot, will definitely be back again

originalText.text:
How does one begin to write a review on a little piece of heaven on earth. RA MA NYC is not for the weak ‚Äî you are challenged both mentally and physically. To walk through the doors at RA MA is to own your inner warrior power and to understand that you will be guided through a higher scientific spirtual intelligent practice.
I would share my personal experience, however through my practice ‚Äî It‚Äôs better left unsaid and for you all to take the steps towards your higher self.

originalText.text: Rama yoga studio is amazing. The people and the energy there is breathtaking. I‚Äôm new at yoga and they make you feel like you can do it even though it‚Äôs hard for me.  I love it! And it‚Äôs helping me work through and release a lot of trauma and past pain. A special shout to the teachers there Louise, Melissa, Jvat, Kelly Josh and Pritam. Their classes are amazing. Every chance I get I just stop bye to look at what‚Äôs new in the store many hidden gems. They have a little bit of everything regarding peace for crystals to jewelry made with crystals, yoga mats oils and even books.  It‚Äôs a wonderful experience overall. Psst!!!!!!! They have this herbal tea that‚Äôs to rejoice on a porch in a nice cool breeze!!!!!!!!!
